website_summaries.verdict: Lightweight running shoes that promote natural movement in a neutral package.
pros: Available in a variety of attractive designs
The PureFlow 7 features an extremely flexible sole
The toe box is comfortably wide, and the shoe is lightweight
Despite a minimalist design, the shoes provide a good deal of arch support and a great fit
cons: The lightweight construction is not as durable as other Brooks brand shoes

customer_reviews.title: Lacks support
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing Brooks Pure Flow for many years. This new iteration - Pure Flow 7 - is not as good as previous versions. It lacks the typical Brooks support especially along the inner side/arch area. It allows your foot to pronate. The fabric is very soft and does not support the foot. My feet and arches actually hurt when I wear them. This has NEVER happened before with Brooks.
customer_reviews.author: Serena Bell Refoua

customer_reviews.title: perfect. Absolutely comfortable right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Can you imagine buying a pair of shoes online and having them fit perfectly, without even trying them on. Followed direction on sizing. I wear size 8 in a dress shoe, went up 1/2 size in this athletic shoe, perfect. Absolutely comfortable right out of the box. I am not a runner but wear them all day, I am a 'mature' woman and feel very stable wearing this shoe. Also, nice looking, (the shoe, not me).
customer_reviews.author: Carol Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Feels better than any shoe I have owned. Order 1/2 size up.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely in love with these! I have plantar fasciitis in lui left foot and always wear inner soles. These shoes feel so good and work perfect for my HIIT training and working. I am a size 9 and ordered a 9.5z
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love our Brook's shoes; they are normally great shoes, loved this new style....but after just 5 months of normal wear on the toes of each shoe there are marks in the design along with tiny holes with only use of walking and everyday-nothing harsh. This new pair of BrookFlow7 looks worse than my BrooksFlow4's years older. Extremely disappointed in the quality for the price. We purchase 2-3 pairs of Brooks every year and this is the first time we have had this kind of lack of quality durability.
customer_reviews.author: kbknit

customer_reviews.title: Very Narrow
customer_reviews.text: Very narrow. Not your normal “B” width. I have wide feet and I’ve never had a problem with Brooks shoes before. There were very difficult to put on and once on very tight. Not as much cushion as my other Brooks. The material is very different than what I’m used to. I tried to zoom in on the material for you to get an idea of what I mean. I didn’t like the stitches that can be seen all around the shoe. Look at the pictures and you will see. Good price but not what I expected. I’m returning them.
customer_reviews.author: 🧡 Mollyngil 🧡

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for healthcare workers
customer_reviews.text: I'm a nurse on a busy hospital unit and these shoes are great! They have super comfy and soft uppers, but not so soft that feet will pronate. When I first put them on the bottoms felt a little stiff and not cushiony but after a few hrs of work I noticed that the bottoms actually felt really nice. Keep feet feeling close to the ground with just the right amount of cushion. Great arch support too
customer_reviews.author: Johnson's

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SHOES
customer_reviews.text: I go a half size up so I have room while running. I. Just find it more comfortable. This is my third pair of pure flows and my umpteenth pair of Brooke’s. They are quality shoes, plus I like the black and white combo. I use these for the elliptical and gym and bopping around town.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Very rounded toe feel smaller than other Brooks shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th or 5th pair of Brooks shoes. These feel smaller but put against my old pair are close to the same length. I think the very rounded toebox makes these fit differently than my Brooks running shoes with a longer toe. I wish I had ordered a half size up. Extremely comfortable, and my podiatrist is always pleased when I have one Brooks shoes. He recommends them.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Lukens

customer_reviews.title: Fast, responsive, comfortable Brooks PureFlow running shoe.
customer_reviews.text: This iteration of Brooks PureFlow doesn't disappoint! From the moment I put them on, all the way through my very first 3-mile run in them, they felt comfortable, fast, and responsive. They hug your foot nicely without being too tight, or restricting. The gray color is really attractive - neutral but with a pop of bright pink at the bottom. In street shoes, I'm a true 7, normal width. I always purchase Brooks in an 8, and these fit just like other Brooks models. The Brooks PureFlow 7 are certainly a much better shoe, especially the fit, compared to the Brooks PureFlow 5. I can't comment on the PureFlow 6 because I never purchased.
customer_reviews.author: _thehollow

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these shoes
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these shoes. They feel great and look great. I love the light grey with the subtle shock of color. Some of my best runs have been in these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: My Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have several foot issues, including a bunion and plantar fasciitis, and have tried dozens of tennis/running shoes looking for fit, support, and comfort. These are the ones!! I have 5 pairs of this particular Brooks shoe. It is extremely comfortable, has good support, and a roomy toe box; I can easily use shoe inserts in the shoe. Price is reasonable for the quality of the shoe. It washes well when necessary; my only complaint is that the sole does pick up small rocks and pebbles easily.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a little extra cushion for running on sidewalk. These are great even without my normal super feet inserts. Using for a couple weeks, and no complaints so far! I encourage folks to check out the tool on the brooks website to find your perfect shoe. I did and I am super happy with the result, Pure Flow 7s are the ticket!
customer_reviews.author: Hilary Whitehead

customer_reviews.title: Sorta minimalist but with cushion and support.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes for everyday wear. Lightweight but just enough cushion and support to last me all day at work. My feet are horribly fussy and I'm prone to plantar fasciitis and ruptured blood vessels (connective tissue disorder). But too much support backfires on me and it also usually means a bulky heavy shoe. These seem to hit that happy medium. I own more than one pair! I wish I could have more!
customer_reviews.author: Twitchy

customer_reviews.title: Bruised my ankle! :(
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these shoes! I have a couple runner friends that swear by this brand. Unfortunately, the mold of the heel underneath my ankles seems to stab into them once I got running. I ended up with a huge bruise and my ankle was tender for a long time after. I will probably invest the time to go to a shoe store that specifies in running shoes to avoid this happening again.
customer_reviews.author: Mal

customer_reviews.title: Very different from PureFlow 4 - in a bad way.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of PureFlow 7s to replace my favorite PureFlow 4 running shoes that my dog destroyed. The PureFlow 7 design is very different and I don't like it at all. It feels wider and the sole seems less flexible than the 4s. When I run, it feels like I am stomping. Also, the elastic shoelaces that were in the 4s have been replaced with regular laces which do not allow for easy on and off in triathlon transition. So far I've only put ten miles on them in three runs. Kept hoping they just had to be broken in. Nope. Still stiff and stompy. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Martha P.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Brooks shoes yet
customer_reviews.text: I love the shape of the toe line of these Brooks shoes. Very comfortable. I bought them after breaking a bone in my foot and needed to wear shoes 24/7 to help support my foot after it healed some. I would buy these shoes in every color option. Just told my husband I need to buy another pair just to have when I wear out these ones.
customer_reviews.author: Material Girl

customer_reviews.title: Love them!  Great support!!.
customer_reviews.text: This brand came highly recommended and this show didn’t disappoint. I wear these shoes with khaki pants on days when I have a lot of walking to do at school. I also use them at the gym. I normally wear a tight 8. I upsized to 8.5 and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: F-Words

customer_reviews.title: Poor Support for a Brooks Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I typically buy Ghost 11s, but I thought I would give these a try because they are Brooks. I made the mistake of thinking all Brooks shoes were of equal quality. This is not the case! These shoes have very thin sides with little support. They feel only a little more supportive than a sock! The sole is cushioned, but after trying to wear these about 12 times, I gave up. These shoes make my feet hurt. So, I slipped on my old Ghost 11s and my pain instantly disappeared, Something is wrong with the design/ergonomics of this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoe, but maybe get bigger size in Brooks
customer_reviews.text: Great running shoes. My first Brooks. Too small, but the exchange was super fast and easy! I love these shoes for forefoot strike running. Great padding there and also, I could switch easily to heel strike with great comfort as well. Very light and yet still very cushioning. Look nice too! I usually wear women’s Sz 8.5 which are usu pretty roomy for me but I had to half size up to 9 in these.
customer_reviews.author: M. Tanous

customer_reviews.title: Great company - great product
customer_reviews.text: I work in healthcare and shoes matter. I wear Nikes and my knees will ache the next day. I wear Adidas and my feet are tired. I wear Brooks? Whole new woman. I stand by this brand if you're on your feet all day doing whatever it is you want to do! I choose the classic black/white so I can wear with atheletic outfits and not just to work and the design is sleek enough to be fashionable too. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Godsend!
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a 9.5, but probably need a 10 in these, however, they are so comfortable! Like walking on air, I have high arches and distribute my weight on the outer parts of my feet and these have corrected that, I cant believe I found suck a great running shoe. Dont mind the snug feel, I can always use the extra support on my ankles, 5 star shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great fit as always with Brooks
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my daughter for track practice. She runs cross country, and wears another brand exclusively for that. She was looking for something lightweight to practice in for sprinting in track, and these were perfect. I may finally have her on the Brooks Team (because that's the only brand of running shoes I will buy for myself).
customer_reviews.author: Kfred

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are comfortable right out of the box. I have wide, flat feet and they give me great arch and ankle support without over doing it (which hurts my flat arch). I walk all over our city, as we live in downtown Chattanooga, and they don't rub or blister or even require any breaking in. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Susan S

customer_reviews.title: Question if authentic Brooks
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned several pairs of Brooks shoes and these don’t seem authentic. The logo on the side is like a sticker and beginning to wear off. They also don’t breathe well like other Brooks I’ve owned.
customer_reviews.author: Wise shopper

customer_reviews.title: Just awkward
customer_reviews.text: These were a disappointment. The ankle is too small, height wise. One shoe was just too awkward and hit my ankle in a weird spot. If your feet are different in any way, these shoes magnify that. One of my feet is just a tiny bit bigger than their other. So maybe that’s why the ankle felt weird in one shoe, and not the other. Either that or it was just defective. They definitely make you feel like your heel is going to slip out. They also are not that great looking IMO.
customer_reviews.author: Kass B.

customer_reviews.title: best support
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these for 2 years and they are the most comfortable shoes I have ever worn. They are last years style so I will have to find a pair as comfortable. I have 4 pair. I wear all day at work and they do not let me down. Always supporting my arch, toe bed and heel. I'm sure they will not fit everyones feet, but I have plantar fasciitis and these are wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Jmmst

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased Brooks Pureflow many times and have been extremely satisfied, however this version is a huge disappointment. I have only had these 3 months and they are already coming apart. The black top layer has multiple splits on both sides of both shoes & it is also splitting from the sole on the left shoe. I’m not sure if these are a true Brooks Pureflow shoe, if they are Brooks has definitely declined in their quality. The 2 stars are because they are so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Briggs

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Comfort and support
customer_reviews.text: Great Sneaker. For years, I always bought Brooks Pure Cadence and was very upset to find out that they discontinued the line. It appeared that the PureFlow was the closest I was going to get to the features I was hooked on with the Pure Cadence. This sneaker is even better. Amazing comfort and support. I normally take a women 8.5 shoe. With Brooks sneakers (both the pure cadence and pure flow) I am a 9.5 and it is a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shoes were defective.
customer_reviews.text: I have these exact Brooks except in an earlier version. I have had them for a few years and loved them but they reached their time limit. I decided to buy the newer version through amazon rather than through Brooks for the free shipping. Shoes arrived and were defective. All down the side of both shoes there was excess glue that wouldn’t come off. These almost seemed like fake Brooks. I returned them and going to try to order through the Brooks website in hopes the shoes will not be defective.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Zappos wouldn’t help!! 2 months and ripping!
customer_reviews.text: I am very dissatisfied! I was soooo excited for these shoes!! As for running, they are great. They have great support and are wonderful.. however, I have had the shoes for 2 months and they are ripping. I only wear these for running, and take them off after. I reached out to Zappos, the seller, who wouldn’t do anything to help me! Didn’t even really even listen honestly. If you want these shoes to stay looking good, I’d look for another pair. If you don’t care how they looks after 2 months, then go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle Sizemore

customer_reviews.title: BEST walking shoe EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this shoe. It’s my third pair in three years. It’s really the only shoe I wear. If you pronate and/or need arch support this is the shoe for you. I walk miles per day in this shoe without orthotics (not needed in this shoe), and without experiencing knee or back pain. I hope Brooks never discontinues this shoe. It is truly the best walking shoe I’ve ever found.
customer_reviews.author: JSTP

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these but they were just way too small in my foot! I normally wear 6 1/2 ad I ordered a 7 as I always do in running shoes and my toe went right to the top of the shoe. It almost felt like I was wearing a 6 instead of a 7. I had to return them!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe to run all distances
customer_reviews.text: Pure Flows are my go to shoe, I run a couple of mid to long distance races per year and these shoes can handle the training and the run. I’m a back of the back runner at 62 years of age but more importantly I don’t have any injuries from running. If you like a connection with the road and a 0 to 6 drop I. Your shoe try these...
customer_reviews.author: ginsgnts

customer_reviews.title: A really good shoe for the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shoe because I do a lot of walking and most of it is on gravel. I love Brooks shoes and am not disappointed with my latest purchase. They feel so comfortable and I will continue to invest in Brooks tennis shoes because of the comfort and stability they provide
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes for running! They’re so lightweight and comfortable. I had to get a half size up from what I wear in sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Saylor

customer_reviews.title: No need to break them in!
customer_reviews.text: I wore these the very first time in a weekend trip to New York City. Bad planning on my part for not breaking them in before such a demanding trip, but let me say that I didn’t even need to break them in. I walked up and down and all around nyc and my feet felt amazing the entire time.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after a month
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about these shoes because I have feet swelling issues and back problems. They feel good on my feet but I'm really disappointed because the material came apart on the side of both shoes and I haven't had them for a month when I was wearing them. My return date has passed and I don't have the box so I felt like there was nothing I could do!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Too stiff
customer_reviews.text: Tried these in my quest for a more minimalist running shoe. The support level was as expected (not much) and I like the design and the way they look, but unfortunately they were just too stiff. Can't really enjoy a minimalist shoe when it feels like a board that doesn't bend with your foot as you run. I'd maybe get a more neutral color someday just to wear as a casual shoe or for light strength workouts, although the stiffness wouldn't be great for certain exercises like planks/pushups.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Went half size up
customer_reviews.text: They recommended a 7 on here, but I went with the 7 1/2 and it fits pretty good. They are somewhat stiff, still trying to break the moon but they feel good, better than some I’ve tried. I have bunions and so far only a little discomfort. Think I need to get used to them.
customer_reviews.author: Charms

customer_reviews.title: If you have ever had issues with plantar fasciitis do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Brooks running shoes for 20 years, the GTS, and decided for some nutty reason to switch models. I’d love to return these but I couldn’t locate the return label and then went out of town and didn’t get back within the return window. The toe box is way too tight and something about the support aggravates major plantar fasciitis issues - enough so that walking/running is agonizing. I’ve given the shoes a few chances hoping my feet would get used to them but no go. I purchased them in an 8.5 and that’s the size I’ve always worn.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable but...
customer_reviews.text: These were super comfortable but not the style I wanted ( bought another pair of Brooks). The do run about a 1/2 size to small. I usually always wear a 10 in all shoes but needed a 10 1/2.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Flemming

customer_reviews.title: Not ultra comfy support
customer_reviews.text: I love the rounded toe box! Support- not so much. It just doesn’t allow my foot to sink in. I feel like walking in hard surface. I bought these to walk in- but instead wear for my job - I stand a lot during the day. I guess I’m looking for asics to walk/run. I actually went to famous footwear and bought inserts- much better.
customer_reviews.author: nicole long

customer_reviews.title: shoes for the gym
customer_reviews.text: I like the Pure Flow shoes for the gym - specifically for weight lifting. My feet don't slide around in them like the Ariels did. I don't go thru the toe like I did with the Ariels either. I give them lots of wear so they are finished after 6 months. Glad not to pay Ariel price for a shoe that is short lived - just buy another pair!
customer_reviews.author: Pat G

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe - not using these for running, so not sure there. I like my Ghost 11 and 12 to run in . Bought these to use for my work shoe. Can wear them all day with no knee, calf, etc. pain. Came on time. Exactly what I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Bontrager

customer_reviews.title: Not for running
customer_reviews.text: NOT a running shoe. They slap the ground and make a lot of noise, very strange. Will use as a walking / errand shoe. They grip your heel nicely for no slip and wider toe box.
customer_reviews.author: Itsthatgirlagain

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these shoes. They are very lightweight and durable for heavy workouts and cardio. The shoe has a nice wider toe box and this is the first athletic shoe that hasn’t given me black toenails. I have a high arch and these shoes provide plenty of arch support and the overall fit is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Akoboe

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: I love the Brooks PureFlows. I run a lot and do some jumping and quick direction changing in them as well as some weightlifting. I have problems with my arch and toes cramping if I don’t have the right shoe/arch support, but these are the best I’ve found at stopping that. They’re fairly lightweight and durable too
customer_reviews.author: Paige W.

customer_reviews.title: Great support, light but will support you through the long distance run
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe! After buying a second pair of the On cloud brand I decided they were great for short distances but not the longer mileage. This is my second pair of this particular Brooks but this brand is still my favorite. Just finished my first half marathon in this shoe and did most of my training in it as well. Great support and it feels like a dream if you have high arches. This is my favorite Brooks pair of shoes I’ve ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Snug comfy
customer_reviews.text: I am a 9 to 9.5 shoe size. I tried the 9 first and immediately felt that the shoe was comfortable, but my toes were too squished. I got the 9.5 and much better for the toes! I think the shoe is a little narrow, but not uncomfortable. It is snug in a way that is supportive to my feet. I jut got them so I’m sure they will break in more. The overall structure of the shoe, especially in the heel, is strong and comfortable. I have heel pain from running/walking on hard surfaces at work and my feet are truly comfortable in this shoe. It is also super light, so can’t wait to run in them.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: I Heart PureFlow
customer_reviews.text: I love Brooks PureFlow. I have the 4, 5, 6, & 7s. The only version I wasn't crazy about was the 5, but I love the 7. I ran 2 miles right out of the box and they were awesome. I think they fit and feel pretty much just like the 6, but feel lighter (which I love). I ordered my usual size 10 and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: M.TMW

customer_reviews.title: Brooks are the Best
customer_reviews.text: I love my shoes. I’m on my feet all day long as a teacher so when I get home my feet are tired and hurt. When I wear these my feet don’t hurt as much.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lafont

customer_reviews.title: These are great running shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I run a handful of half marathons every year. These are my favorite running shoes of all time. I've tried so many other brands, but now I just keep buying the same shoe over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Hebert

customer_reviews.title: The only shoe that feels amazing at the first step
customer_reviews.text: These are the sweet spot shoes in every spot. They are perfect for helping the foot do its job without taking over. I don’t think I’ll buy any other sneaker
customer_reviews.author: Islandpt24

customer_reviews.title: Too much heel padding
customer_reviews.text: There was so much padding on the heel it felt strange and altered my gait. I returned. They were very comfortable otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Maggst

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th pair of PureFlows. I’ve worn this brand:/style for years. They have good room in the toe box, and just the right support for an external pronator like myself. The 7’s are super lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: dill

customer_reviews.title: They have a nice look. However the way the ankle dips down ...
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning these. They have a nice look. However the way the ankle dips down it provides no support.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Great support!
customer_reviews.text: While waiting for surgery on a torn meniscus, these shoes were perfect. The sole offers ample support - it provides a good base. The material of the show itself is strong so I feel my foot is supported. After surgery, I bought another pair in gray. I highly recommend these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Bensinger

customer_reviews.title: Ready to Run
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Brooks Pureflow 7. I plan on getting another pair before they don’t make them anymore. I run everyday 5+ miles and these hold up well. I do not like too much support so these are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Camren N.

customer_reviews.title: reliable and well made
customer_reviews.text: This is my 10th pair of Brooks for me and my daughters. You can't go wrong. Great neutral shoe that your teenagers will wear.
customer_reviews.author: CLEVELAND MOM

customer_reviews.title: Great show
customer_reviews.text: I love this show. I run, walk, and ruck a lot and this shoe fits the bill for all of these. It has a low bottom, wider toe box, and is super comfortable for long distances and heavy weight. Holds up well.
customer_reviews.author: Mama

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: Not for me. I’m normally an Altra (trail) and Saucony Liberty (road) shoe girl but I’ve heard such good things about Brooks so I wanted to try. They were terrible! Felt like I had something digging in my arch. Thankful for Amazons return policy!
customer_reviews.author: Molly H

customer_reviews.title: My first pair of Brooks and I love them
customer_reviews.text: These may be my favorite athletic shoes yet. They are very comfortable and fit exactly as I expected. They also look good enough to just wear every day if I need. They seem to be true to size as the size I expected fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Fake. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I own 3 brooks. These are fake. All my brooks are the same style and size and these don’t fit. Sadly you need to put them on to make sure and do I can’t return. But I would never suggest them!
customer_reviews.author: Turkish Rose

customer_reviews.title: Second Pair for Me
customer_reviews.text: Shoe is lightweight and extremely comfortable without being bulky. Good support. Not crazy about the hot pink edge on the sole but this is for comfort, not fashion (although it's a nice looking shoe).
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Yes, it's good
customer_reviews.text: I had a previous version of this shoe and wore it out. They were my favorite, so these are the replacement. Yes, these are good shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Mtee

customer_reviews.title: First Time to Buy Brooks Shoe
customer_reviews.text: My walking buddy recently bought a pair of Brooks shoes and liked them. As a result, I ordered a pair of Pureflow 7 shoes and really like their appearance (understated logo) and comfortable and form fitting heel.
customer_reviews.author: D. Robertson

customer_reviews.title: I love brooks, but the toe box is smaller on ...
customer_reviews.text: I love brooks, but the toe box is smaller on these than their reveena shoes and the arch is lower. I'm disappointed. I've been wearing them about a month, I wish I'd returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Twofer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice but a bit too small for me
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with the shoe overall. As a true 10.5 size I find it difficult to get shoes to fit properly. These were just a smidge too narrow and short for my feet. The toe of the shoe is not flexible and therefore not 100% comfortable with my toes touching it.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Evans

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe. I work on concrete floors all day walking full 8 hours. So comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: brandee

customer_reviews.title: Arrived already soiled.
customer_reviews.text: When I took them out of the box they were dirty and not in brand new condition as I would have expected. Fit is snug. I might try ordering a half size up.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! I where them to work in almost very day switching out with my other pair of brooks! I work on my feet all day, so knowing I can come home at the end of a ten hour day with no pain is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin Engbarth

customer_reviews.title: Love this show
customer_reviews.text: I love purflo this is my third pair. They are very comfortable shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Happy to find my size!
customer_reviews.text: Love them!! Lots of cushion but great support as well!
customer_reviews.author: Donna G. Tarasek

customer_reviews.title: Another Great Brooks Sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Great Brooks quality, fits true to size, a little roomy in the toe area, but only slight. My feet feel like they are in a glove! Very comfortable right out of the box, just what I expected, at a great price from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Burger

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I'm usually a 9 or 9.5 women's but Brooks tend to run a little small on me for some reason. I ordered a 10 and they fit perfectly! I got these shoes to keep at work but I'm considering buying a second pair to have at home!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Clay

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Not as comfortable as I expected for Brooks. They are a little wide but are still comforyto walk in.
customer_reviews.author: soonergirl

customer_reviews.title: Weird look at the toe
customer_reviews.text: I've never tried a Brooks shoe that wasn't comfortable, but these are a little heavier and more structured feeling than the others I've owned. The main reason for a review less than 5 stars is that the toe has a weird very round look that I don't care for. Very unattractive. Almost looks like a baby shoe lol
customer_reviews.author: Tammie McNeill

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Brooks have long been my favorite shoe but these have great ankle support and my orthotics fit well in them. Good for everyday wear, not just running
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: This brand is always a win-win for me. Good quality, good fit, and they hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Spradlin

customer_reviews.title: On my third pair!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of Brooks Pure Flow. I have tried several running/workout shoes but these are my favorite. They are great for running and lifting. Great arch support, they are light and fit super!
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth busch

customer_reviews.title: love these shoes - lightweight, good looking
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a shoe with a removable insole that would allow me to use my orthotics - these shoes definitely fit my needs
customer_reviews.author: G. Katilius

customer_reviews.title: My only running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes, brooks pureflow work for my feet perfectly. True to size, nice room in the toebox
customer_reviews.author: Aisling

customer_reviews.title: Women’s shoe shows in men’s filter
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my dad for Father’s Day. Didn’t real indicate it was a women’s shoe since I was in the men’s section. Just gave them to him and got a big laugh. Too bad I missed my return window, not as funny now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smaller snug fit canvas compared to other Brooks
customer_reviews.text: This Brooks 7.5 B shoe is smaller than the other styles
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Peck

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoe for the Price
customer_reviews.text: My feet are slightly wider, but the size 7 fit true to size and super comfortably. The shoe was stylish and hardly felt like it needed broken in. I've been using asics for years but these were by far more comfortable (even with a heel spur, a two mile jog felt like nothing).
customer_reviews.author: stevieb

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. I ordered half a size larger than my normal size and its perfect
customer_reviews.author: Joanna D

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the fit of these shoes. Glove-like, lightweight, yet supportive. Comfortable for my daily 5 miles. 😊😊😊
customer_reviews.author: Gayle. B. Seely

customer_reviews.title: Pureflow 7 best running shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Love the Pureflow 7!! They fit great and i was waiting for them to come out and use at a half marathon and they didn’t disappoint! They’re lightweight but also have enough cushion for longer runs! Added bonus fun colors! Would buy them again for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Running diva

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Long time brooks wearer. Fit great and feel like a dream. I have one flat foot and one not as flat so support is pretty important, these give me no issues.
customer_reviews.author: D'Anemone

customer_reviews.title: Great for runners
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! Bought them for my granddaughter who is a runner and she loves them. Will definitely buy Brooks again.
customer_reviews.author: L. Goodyear

customer_reviews.title: Best Running Shoe Ever!
customer_reviews.text: These are worth every dime. I prefer a barely there shoe but knew I needed more support as I'm walking/running at least 20 MLS a week. This shoe has a more solid form than the lightweight shoes I'm used to, but they are supportive, not bulky. I'll buy these again in a different color in the future, without a doubt!
customer_reviews.author: Carly Zeller

customer_reviews.title: Great Brand
customer_reviews.text: Nice classic look; well made; good fit. This is the 3rd pair of Brooks I’ve purchased - really happy with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love Brooks and have been using them for a while. I know my size and shoes fit as expected. I love the color and design.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No regrets! Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these Brooks!!! Fit great, true to size, awesome color, super comfy!! I kept going back and forth if I was going to buy them especially since I could only find this color online, but I have no regrets!!
customer_reviews.author: MWard

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shoe!
customer_reviews.text: No dislikes, only likes! Comfortable, breathable, black. This is my fourth pair... love them...
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes for my pregnancy
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Combined with comprehension socks, these have saved my pregnancy feet. I ordered a half size bigger. Will be buying this brand from now on.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Fit true to size, good support and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. I wear a size 7 and it fit perfect! I was looking for a shoe for working out... I was having some heel pain so I started researching various shoes. I purchased a few other brands. I like this shoe the best. Great support and comfort. Also helped my heel.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe but tighter toe space
customer_reviews.text: I love the low 4mm drop, light weight and support. My toes have less room than my other runners shoes, including Brooks. Also the treads are tough to clean when you accidentally step on dog poop
customer_reviews.author: Mary West

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as previous model.
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as the previous model. Quite honestly disappointed. Fit is wonky. Quality just not there.
customer_reviews.author: Wingnut

customer_reviews.title: Great work shoes
customer_reviews.text: I wear these shoes for work. I’m on my feet 8-10 hours a day 5 days a week. These shoes really help my feet from aching, great cushioning!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Horner

product_meta.title: Brooks Women's PureFlow 7
feature_bullets: FOOT SUPPORT: Ideal for runners with a medium to high arch looking for neutral support.
CONNECTED FEEL: Provides a lightweight and flexible feel that lets you move naturally and connect to your run.

MINIMAL CUSHIONING AND FULL-BODY ALIGNMENT: BioMoGo DNA midsole cushioning dynamically adapts to your stride, while the flexible sole disperses impact away from your body for a plush, yet minimal cushioning so you feel more in touch with your run. Rounded heel promotes better alignment, helping to minimize stress on the joints.

LIGHTWEIGHT, CLOSE-TO-FOOT FIT: The stretch-woven upper and soft internal bootie allow your feet to feel comfortable and unrestrained. The clean and simple design provides a lightweight shoe that won’t weigh you down.
